text: When in this zone, defending units can be withdrawn via the withdraw button, in which case they survive the battle.

[[col:fe_white]]Attacker[[/col]]\\nThe attacker must destroy or rout all enemy units before the timer expires.\\n\\n[[col:fe_white]]Defender[[/col]]\\nThe defender must successfully withdraw units via the escape zone, or destroy or rout all enemy units before the timer expires, or still have units present and not routing at this point.
Owning capture points will generate some victory tickets every second. Own multiple capture points for more victory ticket income.
Reach 5000 victory tickets by seizing capture points.
Spend supplies to call in additional units that you selected before the battle.
Gain additional supplies by dealing damage. The losing alliance receives extra supplies. use supplies to order reinforcements.
Badly depleted units can be teleported from the battle and will replenish in the reinforcements pool.
These buttons control any abilities for the selected unit.
Any army abilities will appear here when available. Click on them to activate.
Indicates the current strength of the two forces relative to each other.
Select a spell to cast, or see how much Winds of Magic is in reserve or currently available to use.

[[col:fe_white]]Attacker[[/col]]\\nThe attacker must destroy or rout all enemy units before the timer expires.\\n\\n[[col:fe_white]]Defender[[/col]]\\nThe defender must destroy or rout all enemy units before the timer expires, or still have units present and not routing at this point.
Indicates the position where reinforcements will enter the battle from. Mouse over for more information.
These buttons control the passage of time within the battle.

[[col:fe_white]]Health[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:fe_white]]Leadership[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:fe_white]]Ammunition[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:fe_white]]Status Icons[[/col]]\\nVarious icons indicate the status of a unit. Mouse over for more information.
These buttons control various aspects of behaviour for the selected unit or units. Mouse over each for further information.
Can be captured by positioning units within the capture zone.
Each capture point controls additional positions at which towers and barricades can be built by the defender.

[[col:fe_white]]Attacker[[/col]]\\nThe attacker must destroy or rout all enemy units before the timer expires.\\n\\n[[col:fe_white]]Defender[[/col]]\\nThe defender must destroy or rout all enemy units before the timer expires, or still have units present and not routing at this point.
The defender can use these to build towers and barricades on the available slots.
Can be captured by positioning units within the capture zone.
Each capture point controls additional positions at which towers and barricades can be built by the defender.

[[col:fe_white]]Attacker[[/col]]\\nThe attacker must destroy or rout all enemy units before the timer expires, or reduce the enemy victory tickets to 0. \\n\\n[[col:fe_white]]Defender[[/col]]\\nThe defender must destroy or rout all enemy units before the timer expires, or still have units present and not routing at this point.
The defender can use these to build towers and barricades on the available slots.
Losing capture points to the attacker will cause the defender to lose victory tickets.
Advance through the map taking capture points and defeating successive enemy waves.

Capture points control additional positions at which towers and barricades can be built. \\n\\nThese are a crucial means of diverting and depleting the enemy, freeing your units to push on to the next capture point.
Each wave will open the barrier to the next area of the map. \\n\\nAfter the final wave is defeated, you must defeat the God's champion!
Each capture point adds additional reinforcements to your pool.
Capture points yield supplies which can be used to aid your efforts.
Badly depleted units can be teleported from the battle and will replenish in the reinforcements pool.
Replenish a unit's health, stamina, ammunition or Winds of Magic.
Improve a unit's melee, defensive, missile and shield capability.
Army abilities become enabled as you inflict damage on enemies, gradually filling the associated bars.\\n\\nUsing an army ability depletes the bars, disabling it until its bar is filled again.
Upgrade your army abilities during the battle using [[img:forbidden_knowledge]][[/img]] Forbidden Knowledge.
[[img:forbidden_knowledge]][[/img]] Forbidden Knowledge can be used to purchase upgrades for your army abilities during the battle.
Survive against unlimited waves of progressively more elite enemies.
Increasing your score for the trial fills the bar, granting progress towards the next available award.
Inflict damage on the enemy to increase your score. The more elite the enemy, the higher the score gained.
Controlling the Shard of Tzeentch capture point earns [[img:forbidden_knowledge]][[/img]] Forbidden Knowledge and increases your Winds of Magic replenishment rate.
